name: Sana Bot
description: Sana bot - re-edited from asena. World’s first UserBot made for WhatsApp.

_SANA_SESSION.description: Type here yours Sana Session...(if you dont have session scan the qr code first)

FAKE_PREVIEW.description:
Fake Web Preview.. (*Example: Head
Body
Link
mediaType[2 or 3]
thumbnailUrl)

THUMBNAIL_URL.description: Paste the image url here to set your photo logo as thumbnail

BOT_PRESENCE.description: Type the Presence of bot, presences: online => Always Shows the online, offline => Always Shows offline, typing => Always Shows typing, recording => Always Shows recording.. NOTE : THE PRESENCE WILL BE PERMANENT, UNTIL THE BOT IS ALIVE / RUNNING / WORKING

RBG_API_KEY.description: Type Your remove bg api key here

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 1205xxxxxxxxx (USA number +1)

LANGUAGE.description: only en & ml language is available

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

ANTİ_LİNK.description: Link Engelleme Sistemi. Link Blocking System.

PM_BLOCK.description: Link Engelleme Sistemi. Link Blocking System.

STICKER_REPLY.description: if you need Automatic sticker reply type'true'. Otherwise false

NUMBER.description: give your orginal phone number if you wish to add it in .number cmnd

BAD_WORDS.description: enter the word you dont allow in your group

OWNER_NAME.description: reply for .owner ! give your details, Use => default, to change back.

ALL_LINK_BAN.description: Link Blocking System.- this one blocks all link

NO_LOG.description: Hata logu görmek istemiyorsanız true yapın. Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Görüldü atmak istiyorsanız true yazın. Write true if you want to throw seen.

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for images and videos generated by Sana bot

HEROKU.description: Herokuda çalışıyorsa true yazın. If it is running in Heroku, type true.

TALKING_PINKY.description: Hesabınızı bir Chatbot'a Çevirin! Turn your account into a chatbot!

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Herokuda API Keyiniz. Heroku API Key.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Mute Mesajı. Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Unmute Mesajı. Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Block Mesajı. Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Düzenlenebilir Unblock Mesajı. Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: Sana  Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot. and if you use “admin”, only admin can use bot and not all feature (only features needed to maintain a standerd group)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Herokuda uygulama adı. Heroku APP Name.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! use #pp if you want to add profile picture also add #qt if you want to add qoutes in your welcome message #time for show live time. #dat3 for date. #sysd for sytem properties. If you wnat buttons in alive msg type #button/pp or #button/url... pp=dp of comand user... url=the url u give in ALIVE_URL...

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable kick Message! Use => default, to change back.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable leave Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

CHANGE_BGM_TO.description: Dont leave this blank choose the bgm you need - enter one or two

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

TAG_REPLY.description: Enter jid of your number so that you get a audio reply when metioned example - 91xxxxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net - for india

NO_ONLINE.description: Çevrimiçi görünmek istemiyorsanız true yazın. Type true if you don't want to appear online.
